thread.title: Tom Brady: People Took Trump #039;endorsement#039; Too Seriously
thread.title_full: Tom Brady: People Took Trump #039;endorsement#039; Too Seriously

title: Tom Brady: People Took Trump #039;endorsement#039; Too Seriously
text:
Get Sports Alerts 
29 Sep 2015 07:03 AM EST 
Headlines across the web declared Brady a Tump backer in mid-September. It seemed a logical conclusion to draw after one of Trump's signature "Make America great again" hats had been spotted in Brady's locker and the quarterback was asked if he thought Trump has a legit shot at the White House. Brady said on Sept. 16, "I hope so." But it seems you can count Brady among those getting a bit sick and tired of the online news cycle's schizophrenic game of idealogical ping-pong. Brady told Boston's WEEI, "When you’re speaking publicly, you have a lot of people listening and I think it’s probably in everyone’s best interest, in today’s day and age, to say as little as possible."
